headline: Texas Pacific Land Corporation (TPL): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Texas Pacific Land Corporation (TPL) on The ROI Club’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on TPL. Texas Pacific Land Corporation (TPL)’s share was trading at $1110.14 as of 2nd June. TPL’s trailing and forward P/E were 55.53 and 37.74 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Texas […]
